tool_description: Generate weather forecast map tiles to overlay on any web map.
name: Weather Forecast Map Tiles
title: Weather Forecast Map Tiles

api_list.name: Get Weather Tile
api_list.description: Get a transparent weather tile according to the [Web Tile Standard(https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tiled_web_map).

required_parameters.name: y
required_parameters.description: The y value of the requested tile

required_parameters.name: z
required_parameters.description: The z value of the requested tile

required_parameters.name: x
required_parameters.description: The x value of the requested tile

optional_parameters.name: time
optional_parameters.description: The local time at which the weather should be shown. This is measured in hours since today 00:00. A time value of 10 would be today at 10:00 (even if this already passed). A time value of 40 would be tomorrow at 16:00 local time. Forecast tiles can be requested for 7 days. This results in a max time value of 168. Defaults to 'current'

optional_parameters.name: unit
optional_parameters.description: The unit in which temperature and precipitation should be shown. Can be 'none', for no temperature or precipitation labels, 'metric' for temperature in °C and precipitation in mm or 'imperial' for temperature in °F and precipitation in inches. Defaults to 'metric'
